2025-06-18.content: Chirp 3: Instant Custom Voice now extends support to ja-JP, now supporting more than 30 locales. For more information, check the [Chirp 3: Instant Custom Voice documentation](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/chirp3-instant-custom-voice).

summary.title: Instant Custom Voice now supports Japanese
summary.summary: Instant Custom Voice now supports ja-JP, expanding its reach to over 30 locales.
